title: Pawn Shop
mainText: Put a resource card into Pawn Shop: Add {r:shinies=x}.{n}If pawn shop is ready, any player may pay {r:shinies=x} to add the card in the Pawn Shop to their hand.{n}X is equal to the value of the card in the pawn shop.
flavourText: There is always someone who finds value in the random booze bottles and rocks you have.
